Salt_Lake_City.Geography of Salt Lake City:
Salt Lake City is located in a large valley, the Salt Lake Valley, separated by the Wasatch Mountains to the east and the Oquirrh Mountains to the west. Salt Lake City is located at 40°45'17" North, 111°53'33" West (40.754700, -111.892622).
According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of 285.9 km² (110.4 mi²).
